Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.binder

Class DynamicDataBinder<T,​VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.binder.DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<VH>

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicQueryBinder, InfoBigBinder, ItemBinder
    public abstract class DynamicDataBinder<T,​VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<VH>
    A DynamicRecyclerViewBinder to bind the generic data that can be used with the DynamicBinderAdapter.
